meanings.definition: To act as a parent to; raise and nurture.
meanings.sent1: I parent my younger siblings while my parents are at work.
meanings.sent2: The teacher helps to parent and guide the students in their learning.
meanings.sent3: The robot was programmed to parent the young animals in the wildlife sanctuary.
meanings.sent4: The community came together to parent the orphaned children with care and love.
meanings.sent5: She decided to parent the abandoned kitten, giving it a loving home.
